column4: So, who's the lucky person who gets page of stuff that went wrong?:)
ubuntu-users list, or bugzilla for specific issues
Perhaps synaptic should have the filter by default?
Er, I was thinking of the patented bit but I'm typing somehting else too so I didn't bother heh:)
Yeah, it's kinda odd the installer chose 386 when the cpu is an amd xp(k6 I think)
k7. it's not always right to make that choice.
it's a joke. kde has a search tool in its kontrol thingy
I know, but it was the nearest I can think of.
I think some people are simply just addicted to updating, whether it's a placebo or a real update doesn't matter.
